ygData.subject: Re: Is there a usable list of bard songs?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It has been updated, yes, up to level 20.  There are some errors in it still (it says that Hymn and Chords only work on the pulse, when this isn t the case
ygData.messageBody:
>
> I'll let Jyzan or Mr. Kim or someone point you in the right direction as I
> don't have any of the more descriptive lists linked from work (Jyzan, didn't
> you update the eqvault list to be more detailed or something?)

It has been updated, yes, up to level 20. There are some errors in it
still (it says that Hymn and Chords only work on the pulse, when this
isn't the case anymore) and some areas of debate (some people say
Warsong and Anthem stack and others don't) and I think there's even a
blatent instrument error (I think I said that the lament was a singing
skill song), but overall, it's pretty thorough. The one that's floating
around this list as a .doc is quite good too.

Jyzan
